title: Major League Cricket matches streaming on Bally Sports in Texas, California
body:
GRAND PRAIRIE, Texas — Fans of Major League Cricket in North Texas will be able to watch the Texas Super Kings, home or away, through Bally Sports Southwest and the Bally Sports app.

Willow by Cricbuzz and Bally Sports announced Friday its streaming and linear distribution partnership. Under this agreement, Bally Sports West/SoCal and Bally Sports Southwest will deliver regional Major League Cricket matches featuring the LA Knight Riders and Texas Super Kings to their hometown fans.

The season will be played throughout the month of July at two venues in the United States: Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, and Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

Following three weeks of matches, the top four seeds will compete in the post-season tournament. Seeds 3 and 4 will compete in Eliminator and seeds 1 and 2 will compete in Qualifier. The winner of Qualifier will advance to Championship with the loser going into the Challenger match. The winner of Eliminator will advance to the Challenger match and the loser of Eliminator will be eliminated.

The winner of the Challenger match will then advance to the Championship to take on the winner from the Qualifier match.

2024 Texas Super Kings MLC Matches on Bally Sports Southwest:

Friday, July 5 vs. Los Angeles Knight Riders at 7:30 p.m. CT

Monday, July 8 vs. Washington Freedom at 2:00 p.m. CT

Wednesday, July 10 vs. San Francisco Unicorns at 2:00 p.m. CT

Friday, July 12 vs. MI New York at 2:00 p.m. CT

Sunday, July 14 vs. MI New York at 7:30 p.m. CT

Friday, July 19 vs. Washington Freedom at 7:30 p.m. CT

Tuesday, July 23 vs. Seattle Orcas at 7:30 p.m. CT

2024 LA Knight Riders MLC Matches on Bally Sports West/SoCal:

Friday, July 5 vs. Texas Super Kings at 7:30 p.m. CT

Sunday, July 7 vs. San Francisco Unicorns at 7:30 p.m. CT

Tuesday, July 9 vs. Seattle Orcas at 7:30 p.m. CT

Saturday, July 13 vs. San Francisco Unicorns at 2:00 p.m. CT

Sunday, July 14 vs. Washington Freedom at 2:30 p.m. CT

Wednesday, July 17 vs. Seattle Orcas at 2:00 p.m. CT

Sunday, July 21 vs. MI New York at 7:30 p.m. CT

“Our partnership with Bally Sports arrives at a pivotal time when cricket is capturing the hearts of Americans, fueled by the T20 World Cup’s dramatic impact,” said Todd Myers, COO of Willow by Cricbuzz. “Now, fans in Texas and Southern California can rally behind their teams, celebrating the international stars they admired during the World Cup right in their backyard. With this effort, we’re not just expanding cricket’s footprint; we’re weaving it into the fabric of local communities, offering fans a personal stake in the global excitement of cricket.”

For a look at the full Major League Cricket schedule, click here.

Major League Cricket playoff schedule

Eliminator

Seed 3 vs. Seed 4

July 24 at Grand Prairie Stadium

Qualifier

Seed 1 vs. Seed 2

July 25 at Grand Prairie Stadium

Challenger

Loser Qualifier vs. Winner Eliminator

July 26 at Grand Prairie Stadium

Championship

Winner Qualifier vs. Winner Challenger

July 28 at Grand Prairie Stadium

Major League Cricket ticket information

Tickets for all matches will go on sale in the coming weeks and can be purchased through the official Major League Cricket website. Fans are encouraged to secure their tickets early by registering for the pre-sale to ensure they don't miss out on the action after sell-out crowds in 2023.

title: Washington Freedom vs Los Angeles Knight Riders Preview & Prediction
body:
Click here for today’s sports betting tips from our expert analysts!

League leading Washington Freedom, captained by Steve Smith, come into their fourth match of the 2024 Major League Cricket campaign on the back of one game with no result due to the weather and two victories thus far. The Los Angeles Knight Riders, on the other hand, have majorly dipped since beginning their campaign with a victory.

DATE & TIME: Sunday 14th July, 2024 - USA ET – 3:30pm / USA PT – 12:30pm / West Indies – 2:30pm / UK – 8:30pm / South Africa – 9:30pm / Monday 15th July, 2024 - Pakistan – 12:30am / India – 1:00am / Bangladesh – 1:30am/ Australia – 5:30am

VENUE: Church Street Park, Morrisville, North Carolina, United States

WEATHER: 35c or 95 F with clear, sunny skies

HOW TO WATCH ON TV: USA – Willow TV / West Indies – TBA / UK – TNT Sports / South Africa – ESPN / Pakistan – A Sports / India – TBA / Bangladesh – TBA / Australia – N/A

HOW TO WATCH ONLINE: USA – Willow TV / West Indies – TBA / UK – TNT Sports app / South Africa – ESPN+ app / Pakistan – A Sports / India – TBA / Bangladesh – TBA / Australia – Amazon Prime Video

WASHINGTON FREEDOM FORM: THE IMPRESSIVE WASHINGTON

Led by Steve Smith, the Washington Freedom have a generally very impressive squad in this season’s Major League Cricket competition and that has reflected in the results with victories over last season’s finalists, MI New York and the Seattle Orcas. Even in their game that was eventually washed out, they were on 62-0 off just four overs in the hunt for 204 against the Texas Super Kings.

LAST THREE: WAWLL

LOS ANGELES KNIGHT RIDERS FORM: BACK TO BAD HABITS

The Los Angeles Knight Riders finished rock-bottom in the Major League Cricket table last season but they managed to win their opening game against the aforementioned Texas Super Kings. Since then, though, they have been handily beaten by both the San Francisco Unicorns and Seattle Orcas so are under pressure as they head into this one at Church Street Park in Morrisville.

LAST THREE: ALLWW

WASHINGTON FREEDOM BETTING ANALYSIS

Travis Head has had an inconsistent opening set of matches and was dismissed for a two-ball duck in a low-scoring victory over the Orcas the other day. It is and will remain a rarity for the Australian to miss out too often, though, and against what is a fairly weak LAKR attack, backing Head to cash in as the Freedom’s top scorer would seem a reasonable shout.

It was an impressive display with the ball the other day in that win against Seattle as they bowled them out for just 124 in 19.4 overs. Lockie Ferguson had bowled really well until that point but failed to take wickets so the New Zealander picking up 4-26 will please him greatly. Ferguson continuing his good form with two or more wickets here seems likely.

LOS ANGELES KNIGHT RIDERS BETTING ANALYSIS

LAKR have really struggled to get off the mark with any sort of a flyer so far. Even their 12-run win over TSK was an unlikely defence of just 162. There is a lot of onus on David Miller to continue where he left off against Seattle Orcas whereby he scored 44 off just 22. Miller to be their top batter in the match seems the best bet for every LAKR match.

Bowling-wise, LAKR are fairly ineffective and lack any real thrust and incision, reliant on an ageing attack that includes the likes of Sunil Narine, Andre Russell, Shakib Al Hasan and Ali Khan. Their one dynamic weapon with the ball remains Spencer Johnson and he should pretty much always be backed to be their top bowler in a game.

WASHINGTON FREEDOM VS LOS ANGELES KNIGHT RIDERS EXPERT PREDICTION

This one does actually appear to be a bit of a mismatch. Having a victory already in this tournament, which is better than they had at this stage of last season, is a small improvement and yet still flattering to what is an average LAKR side. This could end up being quite one sided on what should be a dry and difficult pitch but one that should suit the impressive Freedom top order. A comfortable Washington Freedom victory is to be expected.

title: Centuries in MLC: Full list and breakdown of hundreds scored in Major League Cricket history
body: The Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024 season is underway in the United States of America (USA), as cricket fever continues in the country following a successful T20 World Cup 2024 where the USA co-hosted the tournament. This is the second edition of the MLC, where the first season was won by MI New York, an off shoot of the Indian Premier League (IPL) team, Mumbai Indians. Faf du Plessis, the captain of the Texas Super Kings scored the first century of the 2024 season against Washington Freedom at Morrisville, North Carolina, USA, on Monday local time. In this article, The...

title: MLC 2024: Rain Forces Abandonment of MI New York vs Texas Super Kings Clash
body:
oi-Aditya K Halder

The much-anticipated clash between MI New York and Texas Super Kings in the Major League Cricket -- MLC 2024 -- ended in disappointment as rain forced the match to be abandoned without a single ball being bowled at Church Street Park, Morrisville.

The persistent rain not only prevented any play but also precluded the toss, resulting in both teams sharing a point each.

With no improvement in the points table due to the washout, Texas Super Kings maintained their second spot with four points from four matches and a Net Run Rate (NRR) of 1.242. MI New York, sitting in third place, now have three points from three matches with a superior NRR of 1.472.

Texas Super Kings, who had previously been at the bottom of the table, had recently climbed up the ranks after a convincing seven-wicket victory. This win had briefly positioned them at the top before Washington Freedom's five-wicket triumph over Seattle Orcas relegated them to the second spot.

Despite the washout, Texas Super Kings will be eager to continue their upward trajectory and retain their winning momentum as they prepare for their next encounter against MI New York on Sunday.

MI New York, on the other hand, were looking to bounce back from a narrow defeat against Washington Freedom, where they lost by four runs via the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern (DLS) method.

The rain-affected match at Morrisville denied them the opportunity to regain their momentum. Nevertheless, they will be keen to secure a victory in their upcoming rematch against the Texas Super Kings, this time set to be played in Dallas.

The abandonment of the match due to rain underscores the unpredictable nature of cricket and the impact of weather on the sport. Fans and players alike were left frustrated as the elements took precedence over the game. Both teams will now look forward to their next face-off, hoping for clear skies and a chance to compete.

As the Major League Cricket 2024 progresses, every point becomes crucial, and both Texas Super Kings and MI New York will be eyeing their next clash with determination to improve their standings and continue their pursuit of the championship.

title: Major League Cricket 2024- Match 11, WF vs LAKR and Match 12, MINY vs TSK- Cricket Betting Tips and Match Predictions: July 14
body:
Here are the Fantasy Cricket Predictions and Betting Tips for the Major League Cricket Match 11- Washington Freedom vs LA Knight Riders and Match 12- MI New York vs Texas Super Kings, which will be played on the 14th of July at the Church Street Park, Morrisville and the Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas.

Points Table

Match 11- Washington Freedom vs LA Knight Riders (Church Street Park, Morrisville)

Current Form Washington Freedom:

Washington Freedom are currently placed at the 1st position on points table with 2 wins to their credit.

The top run scorer for Washington Freedom in the Major League Cricket is Steven Smith with 84 runs to his name.

The top wicket taker for Washington Freedom in the Major League Cricket is Saurabh Netravalkar with 8 scalps under his belt.

Washington Freedom have won their previous match against Seattle Orcas by 5 wickets.

Seattle Orcas batted first and they posted a total of 124 before being bowled out. Ryan Rickelton and Nauman Anwar got out cheaply. Quinton de Kock showed some promise and early signs of form but couldn't prolong his innings. Heinrich Klaasen played well, scored 51 off 30 balls and helped his team get to 124 on a very tough pitch to bat on. For Washington Freedom, Saurabh Netravalkar picked up 3 wickets while Lockie Ferguson accounted for 4 wickets.

During the chase, Washington Freedom got off to a shaky start, losing both their openers cheaply. Rachin Ravindra played well and utilized the powerplay overs by scoring 26 runs in 16 balls. A couple of wickets fell in quick succession in the middle overs but Obus Pienaar kept his cool, scored 31 runs and won the match for Washington Freedom with 5 wickets in hand.

Current Form LA Knight Riders:

LA Knight Riders are currently placed at the 4th position on points table with 1 win to their credit.

The top run scorer for LA Knight Riders in the Major League Cricket is Jason Roy with 97 runs to his name.

The top wicket taker for LA Knight Riders in the Major League Cricket is Spencer Johnson with 6 scalps under his belt.

LA Knight Riders have lost their previous match against Seattle Orcas by 9 wickets.

LA Knight Riders batted first and they posted a total of 168 for 5 in 20 overs. Sunil Narine, Unmukt Chand and Shakib Al Hasan got out cheaply. Jason Roy and David Miller played with a lot of heart and smashed 69 and 44 runs respectively to help LA Knight Riders get to a competitive total of 168 in 20 overs of play.

During the chase, Nauman Anwar got out cheaply. After his dismissal, Ryan Rickelton and Quinton de Kock then played with a lot of courage and intent. Rickelton scored a century and made 103 runs off 66 balls while De Kock scored 51 runs to win the match for Seattle Orcas with 9 wickets in hand.

Batting Stats T20

Let’s have a look at the squads:

LA Knight Riders

Martin Guptill, Jaskaran Malhotra, Alex Carey, Spencer Johnson, Saif Badar, Ali Sheikh, Andre Russell, David Miller, Unmukt Chand, Bhaskar Yadram, Ali Khan, Rilee Rossouw, Shadley van Schalkwyk, Sunil Narine, Jason Roy, Shakib Al Hasan, Gajanand Singh, Lockie Ferguson, Adam Zampa, Nitish Kumar

Washington Freedom

Rachin Ravindra, Ian Holland, Akeal Hosein, Lockie Ferguson, Justin Dill, Jack Edwards, Lahiru Milantha, Andries Gous, Amila Aponso, Steve Smith, Saurabh Netravalkar, Yasir Mohammed, Obus Pienaar, Glenn Maxwell, Akhilesh Bodugum, Marco Jansen, Mukhtar Ahmed, Andrew Tye, Travis Head

Cricket Betting Tips and Match Predictions* - PrePlay

Who will win the toss? – LA Knight Riders

Who will win?- Washington Freedom

Top Batter (Runs Scored) - Jason Roy (LA Knight Riders), Steven Smith (Washington Freedom)

Top Bowler (Wickets taken) - Sunil Narine (LA Knight Riders), Saurabh Netravalkar (Washington Freedom)

Most Sixes – Jason Roy (LA Knight Riders), Steven Smith (Washington Freedom)

Player of the Match- Saurabh Netravalkar (Washington Freedom)

Team Scores Batting first – Washington Freedom 150+, LA Knight Riders 140+

Match Handicap: Washington Freedom

Wicket Takers T20

Match 12- MI New York vs Texas Super Kings (Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas)

Current Form MI New York:

MI New York are currently placed at the 3rd position on points table with 1 win to their credit.

The top run scorer for MI New York in the Major League Cricket is Nicholas Pooran with 106 runs to his name.

The top wicket taker for MI New York in the Major League Cricket is Trent Boult with 3 scalps under his belt.

MI New York have lost their previous match against Washington Freedom by 4 runs (DLS method).

MI New York batted first and they posted a total of 154 for 9 in 20 overs. The start wasn't encouraging but Nicholas Pooran made sure that he didn't throw his wicket away. Pooran made 44 runs off 30 balls and laid the foundation for a big total. After he got out, Rashid Khan took over the role of an enforcer. He scored 31 off 15 balls and took MI New York to 154 in 20 overs of play.

During the chase, Washington Freedom lost Travis Head quite early. After his dismissal, Steven Smith let loose and smashed Anrich Nortje for 22 runs in his first over. Then the rain arrived and Washington Freedom were ahead in the DLS calculation by 4 runs. The match couldn't restart again and Washington Freedom were declared winners by 4 runs (DLS method).

Current Form Texas Super Kings:

Texas Super Kings are currently placed at the 2nd position on points table with 1 win to their credit.

The top run scorer for Texas Super Kings in the Major League Cricket is Faf du Plessis with 148 runs to his name.

The top wicket taker for Texas Super Kings in the Major League Cricket is Mohammad Mohsin with 4 scalps under his belt.

Texas Super Kings have won their previous match against San Francisco Unicorns by 7 wickets.

San Francisco Unicorns batted first and they posted a total of 127 before being bowled out. Finn Allen got them off to a flier but his innings was very short lived as he got out after scoring 10 off 4 balls. Matthew Short also showed a lot of promise in his knock of 33 runs in 15 balls. He also threw his wicket away when his team needed him to stay until the end. After his dismissal, San Francisco Unicorns simply surrendered to the phenomenal bowling performance by Texas Super Kings and they were bowled out for a small total of 127. For Texas Super Kings Mohammad Mohsin picked up 4 wickets.

During the chase, Faf du Plessis and Devon Conway led the chase with good conviction. They scored 32 and 34 runs respectively to almost seal the deal in favor of Texas Super Kings. Mitchell Santner hit the winning runs as Texas Super Kings emerged victorious by 7 wickets.

Most 6's T20

title: LAS vs SF Dream11 prediction: Get fantasy team tips, playing XI, pitch report, weather update for Major League Cricket, 2024, Match 10
body:

Time: 12:30 AM IST

LAS vs SF (Los Angeles Knight Riders vs San Francisco Unicorns), Match 10 Preview

Los Angeles Knight Riders have played 3 matches in the tournament and are ranked fourth on the points table, while San Francisco Unicorns have played 2 and are placed fifth.

In their previous encounter in this tournament, Finn Allen was the Man of the Match and Spencer Johnson scored the highest fantasy points for Los Angeles Knight Riders with 83 match fantasy points while Matthew Short topped the fantasy points leaderboard for San Francisco Unicorns with 105 match fantasy points.

In the last match played by Los Angeles Knight Riders, they lost to Seattle Orcas by 9 wickets. The top fantasy player for Los Angeles Knight Riders was Jason Roy who scored 96 fantasy points.

In their last match in this competition against Texas Super Kings, Texas Super Kings beat San Francisco Unicorns by 7 wickets. The top fantasy player for San Francisco Unicorns was Hassan Khan who scored 76 fantasy points.

LAS vs SF, Church Street Park, Morrisville Pitch Report and Weather Conditions

The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 142 runs. The pitch at Church Street Park, Morrisville is a sporting one with decent assistance for both batters and bowlers on offer. The team winning the toss may decide to bat or bowl depending on the ground conditions today.

Weather Report for Church Street Park, Morrisville

Temperature will hover around -2 °C and humidity is expected to be around 79%. Winds at a speed of 2.07 m/s are expected. Cloud cover is expected, so expect some movement to aid the pace bowlers.

Pace or Spin?

The pacers have taken 67% of the total wickets at this venue. Hence picking up pacers for your fantasy team should be a good idea. Based on the stats available, We predict that the pitch will continue to assist the pacers.

LAS vs SF, Head to Head

In the only match played between these 2 teams, Los Angeles Knight Riders lost against San Francisco Unicorns. Los Angeles Knight Riders all-rounders have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while bowlers have earned the most fantasy points for San Francisco Unicorns.

title: SEA vs WAS Dream11 prediction: Get fantasy team tips, playing XI, pitch report, weather update for Major League Cricket, 2024, Match 8

title: LAKR vs SFU Dream11 Prediction and Fantasy Cricket Tips Major League Cricket 2024 Match 10
body:
Los Angeles Knight Riders and San Francisco Unicorns will lock horns in the Match 10 of Major League Cricket 2024 on Sunday, 14 July 2024, at Church Street Park, Morrisville. Keep reading to find out the Major League Cricket 2024 Match 10 LAKR vs SFU Dream11 Prediction Prediction Today.

Let’s find out the LAKR vs SFU Dream11 prediction tips for the Match 10, this will help you to make the perfect Dream11 Prediction for today’s match.

Los Angeles Knight Riders vs San Francisco Unicorns (LAKR vs SFU) Match 10 Match Preview

In the sixth match of the Major League Cricket series, the Los Angeles Knight Riders scored 168 for 5 in their allotted 20 overs. The Seattle Orcas successfully chased down the target, achieving 169 for 1 in 19.5 overs. This remarkable performance led the Orcas to a convincing 9-wicket victory.

The Los Angeles Knight Riders put up a total of 168/5 in their 20 overs. Jason Roy led the charge with a well-played 69 off 52 balls. David Miller contributed an unbeaten 44 from 22 deliveries, while wicketkeeper Unmukt Chand added 18 runs off 21 balls. Among the bowlers, Spencer Johnson took 1 wicket for 28 runs in his 4 overs. Shakib Al Hasan and captain Sunil Narine bowled economically, with figures of 0/23 in 2 overs and 0/25 in 4 overs, respectively.

In Match 7 of the Major League Cricket series, the San Francisco Unicorns were bowled out for 127 in 17.5 overs. The Texas Super Kings chased down the target, reaching 128 for 3 in just 12.5 overs, securing a 7-wicket victory.

The San Francisco Unicorns were all out for 127 in 17.5 overs. Matthew Short was the top scorer with 33 off 15 balls, followed by Hassan Khan with 19 off 22 balls, and Sanjay Krishnamurthi contributing 17 off 12 balls. In the bowling department, Hassan Khan stood out with figures of 2 for 16 in 2 overs. Liam Plunkett chipped in with 1 wicket for 35 runs in his 2 overs, while Haris Rauf bowled economically with 0 for 24 in 3.5 overs.

LAS vs SF Preview

Los Angeles Knight Riders and San Francisco Unicorns will face off in a crucial match, with both teams eager to regain their winning momentum after experiencing setbacks in their recent outings. The Knight Riders started their campaign on a positive note but have since struggled to maintain their form. After their initial victory, they’ve suffered back-to-back losses against the San Francisco Unicorns and Seattle Orcas, respectively. Similarly, the San Francisco Unicorns began the tournament with an impressive win but have since tasted defeat at the hands of the Texas Super Kings. This loss has somewhat dampened their early momentum, and they’ll be keen to bounce back and reestablish themselves as strong contenders in the tournament.

Quinton de Kock (WK), Heinrich Klaasen, Shimron Hetmyer, Wayne Parnell, Ryan Rickelton, Nathan Ellis, Aaron Jones, Andrew Tye, Obed McCoy, Michael Bracewell

SF Predicted Playing XI

Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Jahmar Hamilton, Josh Inglis, Sherfane Rutherford, Matthew Short, Corey Anderson, Pat Cummins, Haris Rauf, Hassan Khan, Matt Henry

SEA vs SF: Complete Squad

Seattle Orcas – Nandre Burger, Harmeet Singh, Obed McCoy, Nathan Ellis, Shubham Ranjane, Andrew Tye, Angelo Perera, Hayden Walsh, Nauman Anwar, Michael Bracewell, Dwaine Pretorius, Nisarg Patel, Shimron Hetmyer, Cameron Gannon, Dasun Shanaka, Aaron Jones, Heinrich Klaasen, Shehan Jayasuriya, Wayne Parnell, Quinton de Kock, Ryan Rickelton, Imad Wasim, Phani Simhardi

San Francisco Unicorns – Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Jahmar Hamiltion, Josh Inglis, Sherfane Rutherford, Matthew Short, Corey Anderson, Sanjay Krishnamurthi, Tajinder Singh, Abrar Ahmed, Brody Couch, Pat Cummins, Haris Rauf, Hassan Khan, Matt Henry, Carmi le Roux, Liam Plunkett, Karima Gore

SEA vs SF Dream11 Match Prediction Choices For Captain And Vice-Captain

Ryan Rickelton – Captain

Ryan Rickelton has been in impressive form, scoring 107 runs in just 2 matches so far, showcasing his ability to score quickly and anchor the innings.

His consistent performances and ability to play big innings make him a strong captaincy pick.

Matthew Short – Vice-captain

Matthew Short has scored 91 runs in 2 matches, demonstrating his ability to contribute with the bat and provide stability to the team.

His all-round skills and recent form make him a valuable asset to the team, justifying his selection as the vice-captain.

Grand League Dream11 Team Prediction SEA vs SF

Wicketkeepers: Q de Kock(VC), H Klaasen, R Rickelton

Batters: F Allen, J Fraser

All-rounders: H Singh, M Short(C), I Wasim

Bowler: H Rauf, N Burger, Z Khan

Head-to-Head Dream11 Team Prediction SEA vs SF

Batters: F Allen, J Fraser

All-rounders: M Short(C), I Wasim

Bowler: C Gannon, H Rauf, N Burger, Z Khan

Who Will Win Today’s Match Between SEA vs SF?

San Francisco Unicorns to win

Looking at the squad strength of San Francisco Unicorns, they are looking stronger and are the favourites to win the game.
